content.text: 1 (16 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate
content.eamr: ( ing-1 "1 (16 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate" )
( ing-2 "1 (16 ounce) can frozen lemonade concentrate" )

content.text: 1 (2 liter) bottle lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage, chilled
content.eamr: ( ing-4 "1 (2 liter) bottle lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage, chilled" )

content.text: 0) In a plastic container, mix together cherry brandy, orange juice concentrate, lemonade concentrate, and cranberry juice.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "mix"@27:30 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "cherry brandy"@40:53 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "orange juice concentrate"@55:79 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "lemonade concentrate"@81:101 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "cranberry juice"@107:122 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a plastic container"@6:25 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 2) To serve, scoop desired amount of frozen mixture into a glass, and fill with lemon-lime soda.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "scoop"@13:18 / AC
		:ppt ( "desired amount of frozen mixture"@19:51 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-2-0 "a glass"@57:64 / TOOL )
		:prp ( purp-2-0 "To serve"@3:11 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
	)
	:inform ( ac-2-1 "fill"@70:74 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-4 "lemon-lime soda"@80:95 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
